definition: to store/to save/to have in reserve/heir/Taiwan pr. [chu2]
to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect

sentences.english: This splendid region of mountains and valleys contains many wonderful hot springs.
sentences.chinese: 这个风景英俊山区和上庄储藏着很多温泉。

sentences.english: You can't buy the time and save it in your storeroom even if you are Mr. Gates.
sentences.chinese: 你不能买下时间存在储藏室里，就算你是盖茨也不行。

sentences.english: There, robotic arms transfer the fuel into storage cassettes underwater.
sentences.chinese: 在那里，机器手臂将燃料转移到水下的储藏容器里。

sentences.english: Bottle upright, away from the light, in a cool ventilated place.
sentences.chinese: 直立储藏于避光阴凉通风处。

sentences.english: Experiment study of soak juice by tartary buckwheat bran the clarification technology and store the stabilities.
sentences.chinese: 实验研究了苦荞麸浸出汁的澄清工艺及储藏稳定性。

sentences.english: The team members raced out of the storage unit.
sentences.chinese: 蓝队队员们冲出储藏区。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a cooler having a defrosting heater and an object storing device.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及带除霜加热器的冷却器及物品储藏装置。

sentences.english: Once harvested, they could remain in storage for nearly a year.
sentences.chinese: 一经收获，它们可储藏近一年。

sentences.english: The, soft rot of sweetpotato is one of the main diseases in store.
sentences.chinese: 甘薯软腐病是甘薯储藏期间常发生的主要病害之一。

sentences.english: The plateau is the world's third largest store of ice.
sentences.chinese: 青藏高原是世界第三大的冰储藏地。

sentences.english: White fat is the energy- caching padding that vexes doctors and dieters.
sentences.chinese: 白色脂肪是令医生和节食者头疼的储藏能量的物质。

sentences.english: They proved up 22 billion tons of oil in reserves in this country.
sentences.chinese: 他们探明这个国家有220亿吨石油的储藏量。

sentences.english: Labs in Mexico banked corn species.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥的实验室里储藏了玉米种。

sentences.english: Her savings deposit eames 54% interest a year.
sentences.chinese: 她的储藏存款年利息收入54%。

sentences.english: An exhibit area, with adjacent loading and storage facilities, is almost always provided as well.
sentences.chinese: 邻近带有装载和储藏设备的展览区也总是需要提供。

sentences.english: Thede-non starch lipid can improve the storage stability of the brown rice.
sentences.chinese: 脱去非淀粉脂能改善糙米储藏稳定性。

definition: to deposit/to store/to leave in sb's care
to stock up/to lay in supplies/to hoard (for speculation)/to corner the market in sth
